General.Name: SEL Manufacturing Company Limited
General.Description: SEL Manufacturing Company Limited engages in the manufacturing and processing of textile products in India and internationally. Its products portfolio includes knitted garments, terry towels, knitted and processed fabrics, and various kinds of yarn, as well as ready-made garments. The company also provides aviation services. SEL Manufacturing Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Ludhiana, India.
